name: Space Runners (CampiaoGames)
description:
Welcome to Space Runners!

                                       

Take part in intergalactic racing and take on tough, skilled opponents!

There are several clues on different planets scattered throughout the galaxy!

Use jumps, grab nitros, avoid the walls and don't stop speeding your ship to the finish line!

Can you win?

 

There are 12 ships with different dynamos of piloting. Choose the one that suits you the most.

Explore the different routes on the tracks and find the fastest way to win the race!
